General.Name: Pt Pradiksi Gunatama Tbk
General.Description: PT Pradiksi Gunatama Tbk operates as an oil palm plantation company in Indonesia. It owns oil palm plantation area in Batu Engau District, Paser Regency, East Kalimantan Province with a business license area of 22,500 hectares; and planted area of 12,800 hectares, including mature plantation area of 11,800 hectares. The company also produces crude palm oil and palm kernel; and plants and manages plasma plantations. PT Pradiksi Gunatama Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Paser, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Negara Km. 44 Kecamatan, Tanah Grogot, Indonesia, 76261
